summary: This is an email exchange from April 5, 2020, where one person shares a Daily Beast article titled 'Jeffrey Epstein's Hollywood Pipeline Ran Straight to Harvey Weinstein' with another. The conversation is casual, discussing the COVID-19 pandemic and remote work.
keyFacts: An email exchange references a Daily Beast article linking Jeffrey Epstein and Harvey Weinstein via a 'Hollywood pipeline'.
The correspondence is dated April 5, 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic, with mentions of social distancing and remote work.
The email sender shares a URL to the article: https://www.thedailybeast.com/jeffrey-epsteins-hollywood-pipeline-ran-straight-to-harvey-weinstein.
